column1: Kata Robata////I have no idea why I haven't written a review for this place
column2: especially since I like it enough to crave it! The atmosphere is trendy but casual
column3: the service is friendly and knowledgeable
column4: and the kitchen and sushi bar definitely know what they're doing. I've tried so many things here it would be pointless to list them all
column5: but here are a few gems:
